publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8023 Anne McLaughlin: Good Luck to the Glasgow Gaels—That the Parliament congratulates the primary 5 team of Glasgow Gaelic School Shinty Club on reaching the finals of the National First Shinty Festival taking place in Fort William on 26 February 2011; notes that youngsters from schools across Scotland take part in the festival, and wishes the Glasgow Gaels all the best in the finals. The member has provided the following Gaelic translation: Gur Math thèid le Gàidheil Ghlaschu Gu bheil a’ Phàrlamaid a’ cur fàilte air an naidheachd gun do ruig sgioba clas a còig bho Chomann Camanachd Sgoil Ghàidhlig Ghlaschu a’ chuairt dheireannach de dh’Fhèis Nàiseanta Camanachd na h-Òigridh a tha a’ tachairt anns a’ Ghearasdan 26 Gearran 2011; a’ toirt fa-near gu bheil òigridh bho sgoiltean air feadh na h-Alba an sàs anns an Fhèis agus a’ guidhe gach soirbheachadh do Ghàidheil Ghlaschu anns a’ chùirt dheireannaich.
S3M-8023 Good Luck to the Glasgow Gaels (lodged on 25 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
